pros: Flexible Scheduling, excellent managers, and beautiful campus

job_title: Associate Professor in New Wilmington, PA
pros: Good people and motivated colleagues who want to make a difference. However the institution lacks the financial resources to enable its employees.
cons: The college's (and higher education in general) business model is broken, leading to budget shortfalls and resulting low salaries, low benefits, and low departmental budgets.

job_title: Student Content Developer in New Wilmington, PA

pros:
-Wonderful community
-easy, fulfilling work
-pretty flexible schedule, depending on your superivsor
cons:
-Absolutely zero advancement opportunity
-weird fascination with following CUPA definitions, but conveniently ignoring CUPA pay
-no remote work policy

review_title: Great people, not much room for growth
pros: Great people and a supportive environment. Everyone on campus is super nice and generally willing to help.
cons: Not a lot of room for upward mobility.

review_title: Westminster College is an excellent place to work.
pros: People at Westminster College are very friendly and helpfull.  It is a family environment.
cons: As a small college, we do not have the resources that a large college or university would have.
